statements: SELECT * FROM player_statistics;
SELECT player_id, speed FROM player_statistics ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT player_id, agility FROM player_statistics WHERE endurance > 80;
SELECT player_id, agility, speed FROM player_statistics WHERE agility < 50 ORDER BY speed ASC;
SELECT AVG(speed) AS avg_speed, MAX(agility) AS max_agility FROM player_statistics;
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, speed, agility FROM player_statistics WHERE agility > 80 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT player_id, speed, agility, endurance FROM player_statistics WHERE speed < 70 AND (agility > 60 OR endurance < 50);
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE speed BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY player_id ASC, agility DESC;
SELECT AVG(speed), MAX(agility) FROM player_statistics WHERE endurance < 60;
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, speed, agility FROM player_stats WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT player_id, agility, endurance FROM player_stats ORDER BY endurance DESC;
SELECT player_id, speed, agility FROM player_stats WHERE agility < 30 AND speed > 60;
SELECT goal_description FROM player_goals WHERE goal_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, speed, agility FROM player_stats WHERE speed > 5 ORDER BY agility DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(speed + agility) AS total_pts FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_pts > 10 ORDER BY total_pts DESC;
SELECT player_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed, AVG(agility) AS avg_agility FROM player_stats GROUP BY player_id HAVING avg_agility < 8 ORDER BY max_speed DESC;

SELECT player_id, COUNT(goal_id) AS num_goals FROM player_stats LEFT JOIN player_goals ON player_stats.player_id = player_goals.player_id GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_goals >= 2 ORDER BY num_goals DESC;
SELECT player_id, speed, agility, endurance FROM player_statistics;
SELECT * FROM improvement_areas;
SELECT player_id, improvement_description FROM player_improvements;
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, speed, agility FROM player_statistics ORDER BY agility DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_statistics;
SELECT player_id, speed, agility FROM player_statistics WHERE speed > 5;
SELECT player_id, area_name FROM player_statistics ps JOIN player_improvements pi ON ps.player_id = pi.player_id JOIN improvement_areas ia ON ia.area_id = pi.area_id;
SELECT improvement_description, speed FROM player_statistics ps JOIN player_improvements pi ON ps.player_id = pi.player_id;
SELECT player_id, SUM(speed) AS total_speed, AVG(agility) AS average_agility FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, speed, agility FROM players WHERE speed > 50 AND agility < 40;
SELECT player_name, endurance_measure, recorded_date FROM players JOIN endurance_stats ON players.player_id = endurance_stats.player_id;
SELECT player_name, speed_measure, recorded_date FROM players JOIN speed_stats ON players.player_id = speed_stats.player_id WHERE speed_measure >= 3.5;
SELECT player_name, agility_measure, recorded_date FROM players JOIN agility_stats ON players.player_id = agility_stats.player_id WHERE agility_measure < 5.0 ORDER BY recorded_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, speed, agility, endurance FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, speed, agility, endurance FROM players WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY agility DESC;
SELECT player_name, speed, agility, endurance FROM players WHERE endurance < 100 AND speed > 30 ORDER BY speed ASC;
SELECT player_name, speed, agility, SUM(speed + agility) AS total_stats FROM players WHERE agility > 40 GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_stats > 100;
SELECT player_name, MAX(speed) AS max_speed, MIN(agility) AS min_agility FROM players GROUP BY player_name HAVING MAX(speed) > 60 AND MIN(agility) < 50;
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, agility, speed FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, max_speed, avg_speed FROM speed_stats WHERE max_speed > 10;
SELECT player_id, area, description FROM improvement_areas ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT player_id, max_agility, avg_agility FROM agility_stats WHERE player_id = 7;
SELECT player_id, speed, agility, endurance FROM player_stats
SELECT * FROM speed_stats ORDER BY avg_speed DESC
SELECT player_id, max_agility, avg_agility FROM agility_stats WHERE max_agility > avg_agility
SELECT player_id, area, description FROM improvement_areas WHERE area = 'Speed'
SELECT player_id, max_endurance FROM endurance_stats
